content: Defeating him and taking his spirit will automatically unlock the purple seals, and you can then talk to the NPC and take the Spell from the two-headed dead rat in the cell with him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 3 Secrets', specifically from the subsection 'The Purple Seals'.
The content is as follows:
Defeating him and taking his spirit will automatically unlock the purple seals, and you can then talk to the NPC and take the Spell from the two-headed dead rat in the cell with him.
